means: 腺（状）的，起腺体功能的，有腺的

sentence.Network_en: Michael was given a complete going-over and then treated for glandular fever.
sentence.Network_cn: 迈克尔接受了全面体检，随后又进行了腺热治疗。

sentence.Network_en: I had glandular fever and spent that year feeling rotten.
sentence.Network_cn: 我得了腺热，那一整年都不舒服。

sentence.Network_en: Much of the work on glandular hairs was done with the Solanaceae.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多关于有腺体柔毛的研究都是用茄科植物进行的.

morphogenesis and ultrastructure of glandular hairs in silene fortunei vis ., 蝇子草腺毛的形态发生及超微结构的研究.

list.abs: 1. glandular opticaglandular integumentaria 皮肤腺glandular theory 腺体理论
...上皮除有保护和吸收功能外，也有分泌作用，如胃的单层柱状上皮等。但人体还有许多主要行使分泌功能的上皮，这些上皮称腺上皮（glandular epithelium）。以腺上皮为主要成分组成的器官称腺（gland）。腺细胞的分泌物中含酶、糖蛋白（也称粘蛋白）或激素等.
glandulae olfactoriae 嗅腺glandular endocrinica 内分泌腺glandular gustatoria 味觉腺
医学英语 ... Gland 腺 Glandular cell 腺细胞 Habitat 生境.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French glandulaire, from glandule 'gland', from Latin glandulae (see gland)

entry.def: Glandular means relating to or affecting your glands.

example.ex: ...the amount of fat and glandular tissue in the breasts.
example.tran: 胸部的脂肪和腺体组织数量

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or affecting or functioning as a gland;

auth_sentence.content: Glandular fever is caused by infection with the Epstein-Barr virus.

auth_sentence.content: Future Hub, we now discover, does not have glandular fever.
